other_tests.findings: Negative for influenza virus A and B, parainfluenza virus, respiratory syncytial virus, adenovirus, and human metapneumovirus; Coronavirus detected in both swabs by PCR and confirmed as 2019-nCoV by sequencing.
Patchy bilateral, peribronchovascular, ill-defined opacities in all lung zones.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant radiographic abnormalities were noted, but the patient remained well and did not require intubation or supplemental oxygen.
